00018                                      kIntoWindow,

00020                                      kSpikeStretcher };

00098 inline ULong64_t ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::BitConcat(UInt_t lo, UInt_t hi)
00099 //Concatenates 32 bit high and low words to form a ULong64_t
00100 { 
00101   return ((ULong64_t)(lo) + (((ULong64_t)(hi)) << 32));  
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 inline UShort_t ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::GetChannelNum()
00106 {
00107   return (UShort_t) ((fDataRecord[1] & 0xff00) >> 8);
00108 }
00109 
00110 inline UInt_t ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::GetTimeStampLo()
00111 {
00112   return (fDataRecord[2]);
00113 }
00114 
00115 inline UInt_t ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::GetTimeStampHi()
00116 {
00117   return (fDataRecord[3]);
00118 }
00119 
00120 inline ULong64_t ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::GetTimeStamp()
00121 {
00122   return BitConcat(GetTimeStampLo(), GetTimeStampHi());
00123 }
00124 
00125 inline UInt_t ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::GetIndexOffset()
00126 {
00127   return (fDataRecord[4]);
00128 }
00129 
00130 inline size_t ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::GetWaveformLen()
00131 {
00132   /* returns Waveform length in number of shorts */
00133   return (fDataRecord[5]);
00134 }
00135 
00136 inline UShort_t* ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::GetWaveformDataPointer()
00137 {
00138   return (UShort_t*)(fDataRecord + kBufHeadLen) + GetIndexOffset();
00139 }
